summary: This bill, H.R. 1375, introduced in the House of Representatives by Ms. Castor of Florida, aims to amend the Small Business Act. Specifically, it focuses on disaster loans, proposing to increase the maximum additional loan amount for certain disaster loans. The bill updates Section 7(b)(1)(A) of the Small Business Act, changing '20 per centum' to '30 percent' to provide more financial assistance.
